sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { BreakLine } from './LineBreak' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import styled from 'styled-components'; const Style = styled.div` .signup { color: #665544; padding-bottom: 70px; padding-left: 30%; text-align: left; } .form-group { width:60%; } .button { bacground-color: #665544; } ` const StyleButton = styled.button` color: white; background-color: #665544; padding: 8px; &:hover { background-color: #d4d0c6; color:#665544 }` export const Workshop = () => ( )
